catalog_info.title: Social Issues in Biology
catalog_info.notes: Offered jointly with the Medical School as MG 722.0. Alternates yearly between the Longwood and the Cambridge Campuses.
catalog_info.description: Discussion course on topics selected from the following: history, philosophy of science; evolution vs. creationism; genetics and race; women and science; genetic testing; genetic enhancement; science journalism; genetics and criminality; science in wartime; scientists and social responsibility; theater and the public presentation of science.
